;FFMETADATA1
title=Our Mutual Friend (Unabridged)
artist=Charles Dickens, Lucinda Hawksley - introduction
album_artist=Charles Dickens, Lucinda Hawksley - introduction
album=Our Mutual Friend (Unabridged): The Audible Dickens Collection
TIT3=The Audible Dickens Collection
genre=Classics
date=2018
comment=Full of both satire and social analysis, Our Mutual Friend looks at what could happen in Victorian England when a fortune passes to a working-class couple. The audiobook will enchant the listener with its larger-than-life characters, its poignant depiction of social injustice and the singular seed of hope with which Dickens hints at the possibility of a better tomorrow.
description=Full of both satire and social analysis, Our Mutual Friend looks at what could happen in Victorian England when a fortune passes to a working-class couple. The audiobook will enchant the listener with its larger-than-life characters, its poignant depiction of social injustice and the singular seed of hope with which Dickens hints at the possibility of a better tomorrow.
composer=Meera Syal, Lucinda Hawksley - introduction
copyright=Audible Studios
publisher=Audible Studios
TRACKTOTAL=1
grouping=The Audible Dickens Collection \#0
